cause.description:
Ok, this trip is gonna end up costing me over $3k I've been looking forward to something like this for about 6 years now.. its in 3 weeks time and i'm gettin' nervous!
I neeeeeeed it better!
Send some love!
ps, In the event of this not happening, look out for my "Reraise $3000 for Danny" campaign.
1. Reiki Master
2. Shaman Monk
3. Which Doctor
4. Christian Healer
5. Crazy beggar from city who claims he can heal
6. Jebus
cause.mission: Get it better before an August 5th snowboarding trip to NZ
cause.name: The Healing of Danny's Broken Foot
